fishyplots 0.0.1

    • Plotting biology
    • survey_table

    survey_table

    survey_table.Rmd
    library(fishyplots)
library(dplyr)

    The survey_table function creates a tile plot with labels to represent the number and type of samples taken from each region yearly. First, load compatible datasets from the package:

    # Pull biological survey data
data("nwfsc_bio")
data("afsc_bio")
data("pbs_bio")
all_data <- bind_rows(afsc_bio, nwfsc_bio, pbs_bio)

    The function takes a biological dataset and a species common or scientific name.

    head(unique(all_data$common_name))
#> [1] "atka mackerel"       "pacific ocean perch" "northern rockfish"  
#> [4] "flathead sole"       "shortraker rockfish" "sablefish"
head(unique(all_data$scientific_name))
#> [1] "pleurogrammus monopterygius" "sebastes alutus"            
#> [3] "sebastes polyspinis"         "hippoglossoides elassodon"  
#> [5] "sebastes borealis"           "anoplopoma fimbria"

    The optional argument form controls the structure of the output. The default, form = 2 outputs a ggplot object. Alternatively, form = 1 outputs a completed tibble of the same information.

    survey_table(data = all_data,
             species = "arrowtooth flounder",
             form = 2)

    survey_table(data = all_data,
             species = "arrowtooth flounder",
             form = 1)
#> # A tibble: 121 × 9
#>    common              survey    yr `% Positive Tows`  Ages Lengths `Total Tows`
#>    <chr>               <chr>  <int>             <dbl> <dbl>   <dbl>        <dbl>
#>  1 arrowtooth flounder AK BS…  1982                 0   237    2841          333
#>  2 arrowtooth flounder AK BS…  1983                 0     0    6149          353
#>  3 arrowtooth flounder AK BS…  1984                 0     0    6050          355
#>  4 arrowtooth flounder AK BS…  1985                 0     0    5550          356
#>  5 arrowtooth flounder AK BS…  1986                 0     0    5812          353
#>  6 arrowtooth flounder AK BS…  1987                 0     0    7885          357
#>  7 arrowtooth flounder AK BS…  1988                 0     0    6492          373
#>  8 arrowtooth flounder AK BS…  1989                 0     0    8261          374
#>  9 arrowtooth flounder AK BS…  1990                 0     0    6589          371
#> 10 arrowtooth flounder AK BS…  1991                 0     0   12271          701
#> # ℹ 111 more rows
#> # ℹ 2 more variables: `Unread Ages` <dbl>, Weights <dbl>
